divs: sighting detailsi was in boulder out on a little hike & noticed 2 glowing orbs. after watching them for a few minutes, one vanished & i began filming. during the video, as far as i can tell, there isnt anything visible on camera much after 3 minutes in, but it was still visible by eye. i was almost reaction-less, it seemed unreal. here is the video i have.
